title: "The 4 Foundations of Responsible AI"
excerpt: "So they’re starting to use artificial intelligence (AI) to bridge the customer gap. They’re mining data, using the insights to understand customer needs, and then better connecting with the individuals they serve — ironically, using AI to become more “human.” At least that’s the intent. But AI implementations are complex and tricky."
